ABOUT.TITLE: About The Product
ABOUT.MISSION_TEXT: Our mission is to facilitate household financial management through a digital tool that distributes shared expenses proportionally to each member's income, promoting equity, transparency, and harmony in living together.
ABOUT.VISION_TEXT: Our vision is to become the leading shared financial management platform for households in Latin America, recognized for empowering people to make fair, responsible, and collaborative financial decisions.
ABOUT.WHY_TEXT_1: SplitEasy was born out of the need of many families and cohabitation groups who face difficulties in sharing expenses fairly.
ABOUT.WHY_TEXT_2: The platform addresses a common problem: the lack of financial clarity and equity in households, especially when incomes are unequal. With SplitEasy, we seek to eliminate unnecessary tension and promote a more harmonious and fair environment for all.
ABOUT.WHO_TEXT_1: SplitEasy is a project developed by ChabeCode, a team of students from the Peruvian University of Applied Sciences (UPC) committed to offering digital solutions that promote equity and well-being in everyday life. Our approach combines technology with social empathy to solve real problems affecting thousands of households.
ABOUT.WHO_TEXT_2: With SplitEasy, we want to transform the way people manage shared expenses, offering a simple, intuitive, and fair platform that adapts to the needs of each household. We know that financial management can be stressful, especially when incomes vary, and that's why we designed a tool that distributes expenses proportionally and transparently.
ABOUT.WHO_TEXT_3: At ChabeCode, we believe that a good life starts with good financial organization. And SplitEasy is here to help.

HERO.DESCRIPTION: At SplitEasy, we know how important it is to maintain a balanced financial life. Our system allows you to divide and manage expenses equitably among household members, without complications or arguments. Divide expenses proportionally, based on each person's income, and maintain efficient and fair control for everyone.
HERO.SUBTEXT: Make financial management easy and fair for everyone at home!

REP.HEADER: If you are a representative of the household
REP.SIGNUP_TEXT: Create your account in minutes and access it from any device.
REP.CREATE_TEXT: Add members and define your family or shared group.
REP.ASSIGN_TEXT: Define how much each person contributes according to their monthly income.
REP.CONTROL_TEXT: View expenses, balances, and alerts easily.

MEMBER.HEADER: If you are a member of the household
MEMBER.SIGNUP_TEXT: Create your account with your email or favorite social network.
MEMBER.JOIN_TEXT: Enter the household ID provided by your representative.
MEMBER.INCOME_TEXT: Declare your monthly income to automatically calculate your contribution.
MEMBER.MONITOR_TEXT: Check your contributions and stay on top of your financial responsibilities.
